PMC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 169 Junior Engineer Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 13, 2025, 16:36 IST
 Pune Municipal Corporation
 169 Jobs |  Posted On : 13-Aug-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 38,600 to 122,800




FOLLOW

The Pune Municipal Corporation (PMC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 169 Junior Engineer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can also apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Civil Engineering, can apply for the PMC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Maharashtra.

PMC Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Junior Engineer	169	B.E./B.Tech, Diploma in Civil Engineering.

PMC Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 38 Years.

Age Relaxation:

For SC/ST candidates: 05 Years.
For PWD, EX-Sm candidates: 07 Years.

PMC Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Written Test.
Interview.

PMC Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee

For UR candidates: Rs. 1000/-.
For BC candidates: Rs. 900/-.

PMC Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 38,600/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 1,22,800/- per month.
How to Apply for the PMC Recruitment 2025 :
Go to the official website.
Visit the PMC Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	13-08-2025
Closing date	30-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
